title: Vlad and Zed "Can't touch this" Play
body:
This was slightly disgusting, Riven didn't really hit us the whole fight lol.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZ6CbFMTZTI

replies.body:
Damn... your Zed was clean af dude

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
What does EMISSARIES when I hover over your name mean?

The Emissaries are just board volunteers who specialise in Player Behaviour. We essentially try to help people out and answer common questions that people post here.

We're not employed by Riot or anything though, we're normal players just like you guys who just got a fancy green name :D
Is there a way for me to get said fancy green name? :)

Unfortunately I don't think we can get another Emissary on the team until OCE grows a bit more :( 

But we do have fancy purple name for players who are Distinguished Members, [**Nijiio**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/player/OCE/Nijiiyo) is one of our current Distinguished Members. There's no cap on the number of Distinguished Members we can have, so we're always looking to add more people to it :D

To become a DM in you just have to post positive, helpful, and constructive content. Your content is currently really positive, but I don't think it's helpful or constructive enough just yet.

Feel free to ask me for tips on what to improve anytime, I'm always happy to help ;)

Thanks :) I'll try to become more "helpful and insightful" then :)
Soo... what does insightful mean? :P Just Kidding
Do good things in player behaviour a lot and one day Riot might recognize you as basically a "mod" of boards.
That was a really good play. Were you the zed or the Vlad? (Or neither?)
